void REMOVE_PED_HELMET(Ped ped, BOOL instantly);Parameters:ped: Ped index.instantly: Force to remove.Remove a helmet from a ped

// RemovePedHelmet
void REMOVE_PED_HELMET(Ped ped, BOOL instantly);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
